page.title: 06Leisure in Elford
page.content: Elford has a thriving Cricket Club founded over 50 years ago. Mr. P. Hodgetts is President and matches are played every week-end. The team play all the local villages and there is a good balance of sportmanship and social comradeship. There is special provision for the younger generation to play on Monday evenings. In comparison the football Club was formed only 3 years ago for the boys of village. They play in a league and have a presentation evening every year. Grass roots tennis is coached at school. There are rambles organised for adults and children and the public footpaths are walked by the different organisations.
